content: count 50 5 repeat steps 3 and 4 eight times 6 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 round 6 increase in every fifth stitch 1 to commence the round stndst in the previous round stndst stitch count 20 including 1 chain spaces 2 chain 1 round 3 increase in every second stitch 3 skip a stitch and double_crochet in the next stitch 1 to commence the round stndst in the previous round stndst 4 stitch count 30 10 chain 1 11 skip a stitch and double_crochet in the next stitch round 4 increase in every third stitch 12 chain 1 1 to commence the round stndst in the previous round stndst 13 stitch i e do not skip a stitch round 7 increase in every sixth stitch 6 repeat steps 2 to 5 eight times 1 to commence the round stndst in the previous round stndst 7 chain 1 2 double_crochet in each of the next chain space double_crochet chain space double_crochet 8 skip a stitch and then double_crochet in the next stitch last stitch 3 2 double_crochet in the next chain space 9 chain 1 4 double_crochet in each of the next double_crochet chain space double_crochet chain space double_crochet 10 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 5 2 double_crochet in the chain space stitch count 40 6 repeat steps 4 and 5 eight times 7 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 stitch count 70 3 or substitute with 3 chain if you prefer then use this option consistently throughout page | 7 round 8 increase in every seventh stitch round 12- chain 1 space for every other stitch 1 to commence the round in the previous round stndst repeat round 10 2 chain 1 round 13- double_crochet in all stitches
